mapper.select: select p.id, p.name, p.regdate, m.id, m.login_id, m.password, m.address, m.email, m.phone, m.nickname, m.grade, m.jumin, m.point, m.good, m.hate from member m join party p on p.id=m.id where login_id = #{loginId} and password = #{password}
select * from member m join party p on p.id=m.id where m.id = #{memberId}
